message: This system doesn't have a database and saves information in local storage. Please do not clear your local storage or browser cookies.
Your code must run within a specific memory limit. If it exceeds the allowed memory, you will receive a Memory Limit Exceeded (MLE) error.
Premium users enjoy unlimited submissions, access to Special Level challenges, and additional rewards.
Each solution is tested with 5 input cases. If even one test case fails, the entire solution is incorrect.
Badges and achievements are awarded for consistent activity, solving challenges, and reaching milestones.
For the best experience, use Chrome, Firefox, or Edge. Safari and other browsers may have compatibility issues.
You have a daily limit of 5 submissions. Once exhausted, you must wait until the next day or use diamonds for extra attempts.
Challenges are categorized into five difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, Very Hard, and Special. Special Level is exclusive to premium users.
Correct solutions earn diamonds, which can be used for certificates, special challenges, or extra submissions.
Dark mode is available in settings for better visibility in low-light conditions.
Completing a set number of challenges or all challenges at a specific level will automatically grant you a certificate.
Each submission is subject to a time limit. If execution exceeds the limit, the test case will be marked as Time Limit Exceeded (TLE).
The platform supports multiple programming languages, allowing you to solve tasks in your preferred language.
Anonymous testing allows you to run local tests without submitting your solution, but only within your browser.
Sharing solutions and using automated scripts for submissions is strictly prohibited.
Leaderboard rankings update daily based on user performance and earned diamonds.
Attempting to exploit or cheat the system will result in an account ban.
You can report bugs or suggest improvements via the feedback section.
You can customize your profile with a username, avatar, and bio.
